sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) The character may spend a maneuver and suffer 2 strain to extend the effects of Calming Aura to a number of allies within short range equal to his Willpower. This lasts until the beginning of his next turn.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Calming aura (improved)</name> <number>TAL0001012</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 16:25:43</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0d138660db660c542901de90cf961926</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 16:25:43</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
